name: Jalapeno Popper Skillet Dinner
description: Vegan Jalapeño Popper Skillet is a delicious and quick vegan dinner that comes together in less than 30 minutes making it perfect for any night of the week. Dairy-free and can be made gluten-free.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup thinly sliced bell pepper (red, green or both)
2-3   tortillas (sliced into triangles or use tortilla chips )
1/4 cup cashews (soaked for 15 minutes in hot water, see notes for Nutfree )

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a cast iron, or regular skillet over medium high heat, add oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a cast iron, or regular skillet over medium high heat, add oil.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the onion and peppers, cook for 2 minutes, then add in the veggie crumbles, salt, and chili powder blend, and mix in. Cook until the onion is golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the onion and peppers, cook for 2 minutes, then add in the veggie crumbles, salt, and chili powder blend, and mix in. Cook until the onion is golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the tomatoes, and two tbsp of water and mix in. Cook until the tomatoes are somewhat tender. Mash some of them.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the tomatoes, and two tbsp of water and mix in. Cook until the tomatoes are somewhat tender. Mash some of them.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the tortillas and the pickled jalapenos and mix in
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the tortillas and the pickled jalapenos and mix in

recipeInstructions.text: Reduce heat to medium.Top with the jalapeno popper cream sauce, pickled jalapenos, and 1/4 cup of vegan cheese shreds, if using. The cover the skillet with a lid, and continue to cook until the cheese melts, 4-5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Reduce heat to medium.Top with the jalapeno popper cream sauce, pickled jalapenos, and 1/4 cup of vegan cheese shreds, if using. The cover the skillet with a lid, and continue to cook until the cheese melts, 4-5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from the heat, top with avocado and cilantro and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from the heat, top with avocado and cilantro and serve.
To make the jalapeno popper cream sauce-

itemListElement.text: Blend all of the ingredients until smooth and creamy,
itemListElement.name: Blend all of the ingredients until smooth and creamy,

itemListElement.text: Taste and ajust flavor by adjusting salt, adding more tang with the brine from the pickled jalapeno as needed.
itemListElement.name: Taste and ajust flavor by adjusting salt, adding more tang with the brine from the pickled jalapeno as needed.

keywords: jalapeno popper skillet, vegan jalapeno popper
